org.apache.hawq.pxf.api

Class Fragmenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hawq.pxf.api.utilities.Plugin
      • org.apache.hawq.pxf.api.Fragmenter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HBaseDataFragmenter, HdfsDataFragmenter, HiveDataFragmenter

    public abstract class Fragmenter
extends Plugin
    Abstract class that defines the splitting of a data resource into fragments that can be processed in parallel.

    • Method Detail

      • getFragments

        public abstract java.util.List<Fragment> getFragments()
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the fragments of a given path (source name and location of each fragment). Used to get fragments of data that could be read in parallel from the different segments.
        Returns:
        list of data fragments
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if fragment list could not be retrieved

      • getFragmentsStats

        public FragmentsStats getFragmentsStats()
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Default implementation of statistics for fragments. The default is:
        • number of fragments - as gathered by getFragments()
        • first fragment size - 64MB
        • total size - number of fragments times first fragment size
        Each fragmenter implementation can override this method to better match its fragments stats.
        Returns:
        default statistics
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if statistics cannot be gathered
